text:
July 3, 1968
Honorable Nicholas Johnson
Commissioner
Federal Communications Commission
Washington, D. C.
Dear Mr. Johnsons
Thank you for your letter of July 1 addressed
to Mr. Robert Mott.
Mr. Mott is presently en route from Pullman,
Washington to Washington, D. C. He expects to
assume his duties as Executive Director of
National Educational Radio on August 1. I
will bring your letter to his attention at that
time.
Sincerely,
Lucinda K. Landreth
Administrative Assistant
